query:
SELECT 'total_publications' as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM research_publications
UNION ALL
SELECT 'cby_publications', COUNT(*) FROM research_publications WHERE title LIKE '%CBY%' OR title LIKE '%Central Bank%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'total_organizations', COUNT(*) FROM research_organizations;
